strapiPost.title: New Exhibition On Display At Crystal Bridges
strapiPost.photoCredit: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art
strapiPost.content:
This weekend, Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art will open a free exhibition featuring selections from the Alfred Stieglitz Collection entitled Seeing One Another. The exhibit will be displayed in the Modern Art Gallery from Jan 28 until the end of the year.

  • Perspectives: Seeing One Another highlights multiple insights into how works of art connect individuals, groups, and ideas across time, embodying stories that can be understood in varying ways depending on the viewer.
  • Global story: Co-owned by Crystal Bridges and Fisk University, the Alfred Stieglitz Collection includes works by African, European, and American artists exploring themes of portraiture, family, and legacy.

Find more information and plan your visit HERE.
